edgynode 0.1.0
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

adj_to_edge()

Convert an adjacency matrix to an edge list

genie()

Output Parser for GENIE3

grisli()

Output Parser for GRISLI

jaccard()

Compute a Jaccard/Tanimoto similarity coefficient between two vectors

leap()

Output Parser for LEAP

network_benchmark_noise_filtering()

Benchmarking of noise filtering and normalization impact on network inference

network_benchmark_noise_filtering_kruskal_test()

Perform Kruskal-Wallis Rank Sum Test on noise filter benchmarking results

network_compare()

Compare two (weighted) adjacency matrices using various comparison methods

network_dist_pairwise_genes()

Comparison of binary adjacency weights of the same gene in two different networks

network_make_binary()

Matrix convert to binary

network_rescale()

Rescaling function customized for adjacency matrices

network_statistics_component_distribution()

Calculate the component distribution from adjacency matrices

network_statistics_degree_distribution()

Calculate the degree distribution from adjacency matrices

network_statistics_degree_distribution_naive()

Calculate the naive degree distribution from binary adjacency matrices

network_statistics_powerlaws()

Calculate the component distribution from adjacency matrices

pidc()

Output Parser for PIDC

plot_network_benchmark_noise_filtering()

Visualize noise filter benchmarking results

plot_network_degree_distribution_naive()

Plot the naive degree distribution of a degree table

plot_network_dendrogram()

Function to plot a dendrogram based on gene interaction

plot_network_weight_distribution()

Plot the weight distribution for all edges of a gene

plot_network_weight_distribution_boxplot()

Plot the weight distribution as boxplot

plot_network_weight_distribution_violin()

Plot the weight distribution as violin plot

ppcor()

Output Parser for PPCOR
